attributes.action: Holidaymakers coming back from Pakistan must be restricted for 6 months minimum.
attributes.additional_details: Government must restrict these people entering back into UK because Coronavirus is spreading in Pakistan very fast. Pakistan has gone into Smart Lockdown and these people know that restrictions in UK are easing down in April. Therefore, they have planned to come back with additional risk. Their children will come back and join school, these individuals will join their work colleagues and meet people. It will make situation worse and UK may fall into lockdown situation again.
attributes.background: Parliament must restrict Pakistani Dual Nationals who went Pakistan during this pandemic to skip Lockdown. Its must be implemented for the well-being of residents who followed strict rules, obeyed laws of United Kingdom to come out of these crucial circumstances.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Since you started your petition, the Government has announced that travel from Pakistan will not be allowed from 9 April. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
